title: Help request fmv Gandil Sov 460 SGC 2
author: Wookjie17

posts.post_title: Help request fmv Gandil Sov 460 SGC 2
posts.post_content:
Not (yet) for sale, but hoping to ask for any opinions on fmv for this card. Unable to find any graded comps with this back. Apologies if against rules of this board but didn’t see anything in faq.

Considering selling but would like to understand fair value first.

Tia
I got attacked on here for doing something like this. If it isn’t for sale-you are definitely posting this in the wrong place.

Spring for a VCP subscription.  Or auction it, and you will get exactly what its worth.

Cheers,
Geno

An ungraded Gandil Sov 460 sold on ebay last month for $185.  Tough to tell from the small pics, but yours appears to be in slightly better shape.  So maybe $200 as a rough estimate?

Good luck!
:)

[quote name="tiger8mush" post=2050291]An ungraded Gandil Sov 460 sold on ebay last month for $185.  Tough to tell from the small pics, but yours appears to be in slightly better shape.  So maybe $200 as a rough estimate?

Good luck!
:)[/QUOTE]

Ty appreciate it. Had a hard time finding comps with this back anywhere.

My guess is that it would north of that.  I think it would easily get into the $250 range if you auctioned it.  Just my guess...

Cheers,
Geno
